definition: Suirenshi, legendary inventor of fire
fire/speculum/to obtain fire by drilling wood, striking flint, sun's rays etc
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
clan name/maiden name
see 月氏[Yue4 zhi1] and 閼氏|阏氏[yan1 zhi1]

sentences.english: He taught people the way and was titled Suirenshi honorificly.
sentences.chinese: 他把取火的方法教給人民，人民便尊稱他爲燧人氏。
